Stay focused and conquer your tasks with Focusaurus, the ultimate ADHD-friendly productivity tool. Itâ€™s designed to keep your day on track with playful features and a dinosaur-sized dose of organization!

Features:
Pomodoro Timer: Tackle tasks in bite-sized chunks with built-in timers that help you focus and recharge.
